snippet: Minnesota Vikings star running back Adrian Peterson was arrested on a charge of resisting arrest after an early morning incident where police say it took three officers to subdue him.
abstract: Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson is arrested on a charge of resisting arrest after an incident in a Houston nightclub in which the police say it took three officers to subdue him; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota Vikings star running back Adrian Peterson was arrested on a charge of resisting arrest after an early morning incident where police say it took three officers to subdue him.
